plants.name: Cactus
plants.about: It doesn't need much attention - and it certainly won't steal your snacks!
plants.water_tips: Keep the cactus soil on the drier side. Water sparingly, about once every 2-4 weeks.

plants.name: Jade Plant
plants.about: It's the plant that's all about the 'green,' but don't expect any stock market tips.
plants.water_tips: Let the Jade Plant soil dry out completely before watering. Water every 2-3 weeks.

plants.name: Eucalyptus
plants.about: It easily adapts to both sunlight and shade but prefers a cool spot away from direct sunlight. Easy there!
plants.water_tips: Water it around 3 times a week to maintain a healthy green friendship.

plants.name: Ivy
plants.about: Ivy is your versatile green buddy, the middle-sized charmer that adapts anywhere and wins hearts effortlessly.
plants.water_tips: No big efforts! Water it twice a week - and it will survive!

plants.name: Fern
plants.about: Fern, the green friendo with a scent that reduces anxiety, is your plant pal for tranquility and focus!
plants.water_tips: Keep the soil consistently moist to keep it at its green, calming best.

plants.name: Aloe
plants.about: Aloe are so adaptable; you can even pot them in small containers or quirky teacups!
plants.water_tips: Less is more when it comes to watering Aloe, so give them a sip once a week!

plants.name: Snake Plant
plants.about: They are the sun-loving daredevils of the plant world, so give them a spot close to those windows.
plants.water_tips: Water them three times a week to keep these resilient serpentine friends alive.

plants.name: Succulent
plants.about: Succulents bring a sense of serenity to your space. They're perfect for those with limited room to spare.
plants.water_tips: Give them a sip just a few times a month to keep these water-wise wonders thriving.

plants.name: Air Plant
plants.about: Air Plants are perfect for adding charm to your place. They're like the secret gems of your indoor garden.
plants.water_tips: Water the soil gently twice a week to keep these plants safe and sound.

plants.name: Peace Lily
plants.about: The Peace Lily, a hardy and adaptable plant, fits into any soil and brightens up your space with its elegant white blooms.
plants.water_tips: Water once a week to maintain this peaceful relationship alive.
